Summary: Two types, flashing, and fireball type
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed near 50 of the fireball types floating in the sky, disappeared quickly after hovering for about 5 minutes, directly there after, multiple "flashing" types spotted zipping and floating across same span of sky, blinking red, blue, orange and white. move in erratic patterns and either converge or distance themselves from each other. have seen the same phenomena several occasions in past. was even posted in the beaver county times, local newspaper. the triangle lights seen in the summer of this year. have seen the fireball type on several occasions as well. on july fourth. and a while before that. this got my attention, however, because of the sheer number of fireballs i spotted. as i said, between 50 and 60.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Enon Valley
This sighting has never been favorited.
